description: If you’ve ever ⁠played 2048⁠ before, you know it’s a numbers-based puzzle game where you merge tiles to create larger values. But in 2048 Cupcakes, numbers are replaced with delicious cupcakes! Instead of combining twos and fours, you’re matching identical cupcakes to make higher-tier treats. It’s the same strategy-based challenge, but with a sweet and visually appealing twist.
